# Final Projects

.pull-left[
### Final Project Objectives/Goals

- project of your own design
- answer a question using data from previously published research/vetted database
- comparative topic in organismal biology
- scope that permits data collection, analysis, and write up withina few short weeks 
- requires you to first delve into the the scientific literature
- Follows the same format and requirements of previous reports (4-5 pages)

]
